job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer Python - AI Agents - SaaS
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer Python - AI Agents - SaaS

As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and scaling AI automation platforms, integrating AI models into customer workflows, developing cloud-native services, and streamlining CI/CD pipelines. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems built on AI models, and the associated MLOps and software development aspects. While ML Engineers also work with models, the focus here is on the application and integration into user workflows and SaaS platforms, which is more characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs' directly relates to building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices' describes core software engineering practices for robust applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments' directly refers to MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation' indicates involvement in strategic planning and understanding business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows' implies working with and deploying AI models, which falls under the modeling category, specifically in the context of integrating them into applications.
job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform' points to the development and enhancement of a software platform.
job_tasks.phrase: scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform
